information.imageText1: Save here all your passwords, data or any information, forget paper notes and unprotected applications.
information.imageText2: Create your master password: only you can access your secrets with it.
information.howFuctionText: First of all, you must create a different password for your electronic belongings. You will not be able to recover your password, so remember it well.
information.dataToSaveText: For example, the number of your card, the PIN and PUNK of your mobile phone, the serial number of one of your devices or any information you need to have in a safe place.

formPassword.text1: First, you must create a different password for your electronic belongings.
formPassword.text2: You will not be able to recover your password, so remember it well.
formPassword.clueText: You can also create a hint to help you remember your master password.
formPassword.clueLabel: Create your hint to remember your password (optional)

result.checkTitle: Your Password Manager is already created!
result.checkText: You can check it from the menu.
result.warmingText: We couldn't create your Master Password. Please try again later.

password.min: The password is very short - it must be at least {{number}} characters.
password.regex: The password must include a number and a capital letter.
